# changes in this file.

add_subdirectory(ut)

add_library(vdisk-hulldb-generic)


target_link_libraries(vdisk-hulldb-generic PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  vdisk-hulldb-base
  vdisk-hulldb-fresh
  blobstorage-vdisk-protos
  ydb-core-protos
)
